# RegularExpressionHelper.IsValidGuid method

Converts the string representation of a Guid to its Guid equivalent. A return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.

```csharp
public static bool IsValidGuid(string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | A string containing a Guid to convert. |

## Return Value

true if ip address is valid; otherwise, false.
